actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Budget.
Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: The Congressional Budget Limitation Act of 1978.
short_title: Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act Amendments

summary.text: Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act Amendments - Amends the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act to prohibit the level of total budget outlays in any concurrent resolution passed in accordance with such Act from exceeding, in any calendar year, 20 percent of the gross national product of the United States, unless waived by a two-thirds vote in each House of Congress.

titles.title: Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act Amendments
The Congressional Budget Limitation Act of 1978.
